GSD.product_version: versions from v3.18 to before v5.15.58
GSD.description:
be2net: Fix buffer overflow in be_get_module_eeprom

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.58 by commit aba8ff847f4f927ad7a1a1ee4a9f29989a1a728f, it was introduced in version v3.18 by commit e36edd9d26cf257511548edaf2b7a56eb4fed854. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: be2net: Fix buffer overflow in be_get_module_eeprom
